name: tristinstyling What's HOT to Wear
description:
Pack your bags because it's time to finally figure out What's HOT to Wear. 

In this shopping session, your stylist will determine your personal style based on your current wardrobe, body type, lifestyle, and budget. She will maximize the current wardrobe you already love by mixing them with the new pieces found during the shopping session. 

The purpose of this session is for you to learn how to think outside of the box and create outfits that will be appropriate for you but still be stylish and flattering no matter what you have scheduled for the day! Your stylist will photograph each ensemble she creates with you which will be e-mailed or burned onto a disc to be used as your personal lookbook in case you need to be reminded of the outfits created during the session.



-----------------------------
The fine print:

*To Book Your Appointment
All appointments are subject to prior bookings.  

**Rates and Cancellation/Reschedule Policy
The service rate applies to sessions taking place during business hours posted on the tristinstyling website. $75.00 Rescheduling Fee applies if appointment is rescheduled less than two days (48 hours) from originally appointed time.  $150.00 Cancellation Fee applies if appointment is cancelled less than three days (72 hours) from originally appointed time. 

This session you are about to purchase refers to styling services only.  
tristinstyling is not responsible for any purchases made during the session.  

For any questions, contact Tiffany at 312.545.5529.

name: i-tristinstyling
description:
Clients who have the ability to utilize video chat (http://www.youtube.com/user/tristinstyling#p/u/4/BYAPBCvQ1z0) can benefit from an i-tristinstyling shopping session or closet audit for a fraction of the cost that it it would take to get styled in person!

To see if you qualify, please fill out our short inquiry form at: http://tristinstyling.com/inquiries

name: tristinstyling 365
description: 1 - three (3) hour closet audit + lookbook session ($450) 4 - five (5) hour What's HOT to wear assisted shopping sessions ($3000/year) 12 - one (1) hour i-tristinstyling ($900/year) 1 - year of tristinstyling on call ($420/year) 1 - year of e-tristinstyling ($480/year) --------------------------------------- Total for all services if purchased separately is $5,250. tristinstyling subscribers have two options: pay $400/month to save $450/year or pay $4,000 up front to save $1,250/year.

name: e-tristinstyling
description: If the service is SOLD OUT and you would like to be put on the waiting list to be contacted when availability occurs, please click here If your inbox is constantly overflowing with e-mails from retailers but you still don't know how to get your wardrobe together, e-tristinstyling is the service for you. With this service we are here for you seven days a week to help you, via e-mail, in a fashion emergency or if you just need some advice. Subscribers will also be sent a customized personal e-shopping e-mail at least once a month, with links to wardrobe suggestions and notifications of any SALES that are not to be missed. With this service, you will be in contact, via e-mail, with your very own personal stylist who can assist with last-minute wardrobe needs, gift shopping and more.

name: e-tristinstyling on call
description:
Through e-tristinstyling On Call, we are here for you seven days a week to help you in a fashion emergency or if you just need some advice.

With this service, you will be provided with a phone number and e-mail address where you will be in contact with your very own personal stylist who can assist with last-minute wardrobe needs, gift shopping and more.

Subscribers will also be sent a customized personal e-shopping e-mail at least once a month, with links to wardrobe suggestions and notifications of any SALES that are not to be missed.

We offer two payment options:

$90/month

or

get 2 MONTHS FREE by making a one-time initial payment of $900.

name: Deposit
description: Don't mess with wardrobe distress and get yourself booked with a styling session already! After filling out our 12 question inquiry form, clients are sent a proposal with suggested services and are directed here to make their initial deposit. *To Book Your Appointment 50% non-refundable deposit toward services must be made to book an appointment. Upon receipt of signed document and deposit payment, tristinstyling will confirm your scheduled appointment. All appointments are subject to prior bookings. **Rates and Cancellation/Reschedule Policy The hourly rate applies to sessions taking place during business hours posted on the tristinstyling website. $60.00 Rescheduling Fee applies if appointment is rescheduled less than two days (48 hours) from originally appointed time. $120.00 Cancellation Fee applies if appointment is cancelled less than three days (72 hours) from originally appointed time. The proposal set to you refers to styling services only. tristinstyling is not responsible for any purchases made during the session. tristinstyling Inc. accepts the remainder of your payment in credit card, check or cash upon completion of your session on the day of service. For any questions concerning this proposal, contact Tiffany at 312.545.5529.

description: Trina Turk Black Cracked Leather 'Big Cypress' Bag Reg $535.00 Sale $255.00 This supple shoulder bag by Trina Turk is perfect to pair with sexy skinny jeans and a blousy top. • Color: Black • Supple cracked leather with brasstone hardware • Large front flap pocket with zip closure; dual front flap raised pockets with snap closure • Zip closure • Color: Black • Supple cracked leather with brasstone hardware • Large front flap pocket with zip closure; dual front flap raised pockets with snap closure • Zip closure • 29'' leather handle with 11½'' drop and dual rings • Canvas lining with interior zip, cell phone, and dual patch pockets • Also includes leather bound travel mirror • Measures 19½'' at widest x 8½'' tall at center x 3¾'' deep • Weighs 3 lbs. • Leather; Imported; style#209347000

name: 3.1 Phillip Lim Jewel Necklace Lace Dress w/ Seam Binding Detail
description: 3.1 Phillip Lim Embellished lace dress Reg $525.00 Sale $275.00 Black lace mini dress with nude underlay and embellished neckline. 3.1 Phillip Lim dress is sleeveless, has an oxidised silver-tone brass chain, a strip of navy rope and a row of glass pearls at the neckline, a round neck, a concealed zip and hook fastening at the back and is fully lined. 75% cotton, 25% nylon. • Dry clean. • US sizing • This style runs true to size • Cut for a close fit • Model's height is 177cm / 5'10" and wears a US size 4

name: James Perse Slub Drape Racerback Tank
description: James Perse Slub Drape Racerback Tank in Olympic Reg $85.00 Sale $45.00 The man who brought the lowly T-shirt to haute artform continues to produce the most desirable basics on any fashion avenue. • Color - Olympic • 100% cotton • Slub jersey • Racerback • Styled with Kasil Benatar in Hepburn. • Modeled in size 1 (XS-S). See fit guide for model's dimensions. • Manufacturer Style No. WUA3097 Fit & Sizing for this Item This item fits slightly small compared to standard designer sizing, and the same as James Perse Tanks typically fit(s). This item was modeled in size 1 (XS-S). The model's dimensions are not posted. General Fit & Size Information for James Perse Tanks The tanks in the collection tend to have the smallest fit of all the bodies. If you have a larger bust or prefer a looser fit we suggest sizing up in all fabrics other than the weathered or fashion bodies.
